import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'], }) export class EventosComponent { // Necessario declarar que ele existe: public eventos: any = []; // Property Binding: widthImg: number = 50; marginImg: number = 2; constructor (private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit(): void{ this.getEventos(); } public getEventos(): void{ this.http.get('http://localhost:5282/api/eventos').subscribe( response => this.eventos = response, error => console.log(error) ) } }
